DOC.brief_title: QUAPELLA ( QUAlity Prostate Enucleation LUMENIS - Laser )
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicentre observational study study learn curve HoLEP procedure , auto-evaluation quality surgery senior attend urologist introduce HoLEP current clinical practice . This single arm , comparative study . The primary outcome ability surgeon perform 4 HoLEP procedure successfully , accord pre-defined surgical performance scale [ vary 0 5 ] . To successful , procedure must score 5/5 . Each procedure evaluate end surgical act surgeon . As secondary outcome , short term efficacy safety parameter HoLEP technique evaluate follow data prospectively collect : - I-PSS symptom score ( 15 day operation , 6 12 month postoperative ) - I-PSS bother score ( 15 day operation , 1 , 6 12 month postoperative ) - DAN-PSSsex score ( 15 day operation , 6 12 month postoperative ) Global sexual satisfaction ( 15 day operation , 6 12 month postoperative ) - Quality life score QoL-Europe ( 15 day operation , 12 month postoperative ) - Urinary flow rate I-PSS symptom score ( 15 day operation , day 0 , 1 , 6 12 month postoperative ) - Postvoid residual volume ( 15 day operation , day 0 , 1 , 6 12 month postoperative ) - Ultrasound examination prostate ( 15 day operation , 6 12 month postoperative ) - PSA blood testing ( 15 day operation , 6 12 month postoperative ) One month post-operative questionnaire one month post-operative - Evaluation adverse event ( day operation , 1 , 6 12 month postoperative ) - Satisfaction intervention ( 1 12 month postoperative ) - Pathologic examination prostate tissue ( 1 month postoperative ) - Blood level sodium , haemoglobin , haematocrit ( 15 day intervention , immediately intervention , ) Time need step procedure : - prostatic capsule contact - enucleation median lobe - enucleation lateral lobe - hemostasis - morcellation Laser data ( duration , Joules number number fiber use , fibre type , morcellator an nephroscope type ) - Tissue weight - Irrigation volume - Need coagulation another device - Adverse event procedure - Type catheter surgery - Duration catheterization - Post-operative irrigation ( duration , volume , type ) - Hospital stay . The indication surgery usual indication bladder outlet obstruction relief ta context low urinary tract symptom due benign prostatic hyperplasia , alternative level 1 - Grade A recommended surgical technique . The profile every surgeon record term surgical experience age , number previous endoscopic prostatic surgical procedure , number laser procedure . The study design schedule follow : - Inclusion visit ( D-25 D-5 surgery ) , inclusion write informed consent assessment baseline data - Surgical intervention ( D0 ) : perform previously describe literature , assessment perioperative data - One month visit : one month data - Six month visit : six month data - One year visit : one year data Statistical analysis conduct SAS9.2 descriptive analysis data , CUSUM technique main outcome criterion ( Altman et al .
